description: NYPD Precinct Community Council meeting patterns. Scraped Jan 2026 from nyc.gov/nypd

notes.weekOfMonth: 1-4 for 1st-4th week, -1 for last week of month
notes.noMeetings: Most precincts skip July, August, and sometimes December
notes.nullPattern: Precincts with null pattern have varying schedules - check their website
